blurbShortTxt: Medical device company focused on surgical visualization and imaging technology.

Encellin is focused on advancing next generation therapies, starting with endocrine disorders. Their technology combines novel cell encapsulation with functional cell therapies to treat chronic diseases.

Designs and manufactures medical robotics systems and high-precision components for healthcare facilities. Core products include surgical robotics for minimally invasive procedures, rehabilitation robots with adaptive AI, and diagnostic robotics for early detection.

Neuroscience therapeutics company founded by Dr. Keith Black, pioneering neurosurgeon at Cedars-Sinai. Focus on innovative treatments for brain tumors and neurological conditions, leveraging expertise in blood-brain barrier penetration and brain tumor vaccines.

Develops bioreactor-grown mitochondrial transplantation therapies to address age-related diseases and cellular energy decline. Core innovation includes cultivating young mitochondria at scale and encasing them in organ-targeting Mitlets for supplementation.
Building AI to unleash doctors, not replace them. Agentic AI platform for clinical practices, improving efficiency in clinic settings through intelligent automation.

Proof-as-a-Service platform delivering decades of wellness R&D and clinical validation in under 12 months at 1/10th the cost. Creates portfolios of patentable, clinically proven formulas with compliant health claims.
AI-native Data-as-a-Service platform providing financial investors with realtime, graph-based knowledge about financial markets and investment opportunities. Targeting quants as initial adopters.
Breakthrough technology using wave frequencies to heal DNA damage, improve overall health, and slow down aging. Leveraging emerging research in frequency-based therapeutic interventions.

Hypobaric hypoxia chambers simulating high-altitude environments (up to 29,000 ft) at sea level. True altitude technology for enhanced athletic performance, recovery, and longevity. Partnered with UFC Performance Institute.
